document.discussion_title: Solomon Duah strikes winner for Inter Turku
document.topic_text: Solomon Duah strikes winner for Inter Turku August 22, 2016 Soccer News of Monday, 22 August 2016 Source: GHANAsoccernet.com 2016-08-22 Solomon Duah Finnish-born Ghanaian striker Solomon Duah steered Inter Turku to a crucial victory over Lahti in the Finnish top-flight on Sunday. The 23-year-old sealed victory for Turku in the 53rd minute. Turku tool a 1-0 away lead before the promising striker scored the second goal. The host later pulled a goal back to end the game 2-1. Courtesy of GHANAsoccernet.com – Ghana’s leading football news website. Click for more news.
